entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing this morning. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
